guide.title: TAT App User Guide
guide.subtitle: How to get the most out of Today Ad Trend app
guide.introDesc: TAT (Today Ad Trend) is an app that allows you to explore and experience various mobile ad formats. It helps marketers, developers, and advertising professionals understand real ad formats and identify trends.
guide.gettingStartedDesc: Learn how to install and use the TAT app.
guide.downloadAppDesc: Search for 'TAT' or 'Today Ad Trend' on the App Store or Google Play to download the app.
guide.launchAppDesc: Once installed, launch the app. You can use it immediately without signing up.
guide.exploreTabsDesc: Use the bottom tab bar to navigate between Banner, Interstitial, Rewarded, and Settings screens.
guide.bannerAdsDesc: Banner ads are rectangular ads that occupy part of the app screen. In TAT, you can view various banner sizes.
guide.bannerTip: Use the filter buttons to view only specific banner types. Select 'All' to see all types at once.
guide.interstitialAdsDesc: Interstitial ads are full-screen ads that cover the entire screen. They typically appear between game levels or at content transition points.
guide.selectInterstitialTabDesc: Tap the Interstitial icon in the bottom tab bar.
guide.waitForAdLoadingDesc: Wait until the Status changes to 'Ready'. While the ad is loading, it will show 'Loading...'.
guide.viewTheAdDesc: Tap the 'Show Ad' button to view the interstitial ad. A close button will appear after a certain time.
guide.interstitialNote: Interstitial ads can disrupt user experience, so they should be used carefully at appropriate times in real apps.
guide.rewardedAdsDesc: Rewarded ads are ads that users voluntarily watch in exchange for rewards. This is the ad format with the highest user satisfaction.
guide.selectRewardedTabDesc: Select the Rewarded (gift icon) tab from the bottom tab bar.
guide.watchTheAdDesc: Tap the 'Watch Ad & Earn' button to watch the rewarded ad. You must watch the entire ad to receive the reward.
guide.checkRewardsDesc: After watching the ad, the 'Total Rewards Earned' counter will increase. You'll also see a notification confirming your reward.
guide.rewardedBenefitsDesc: Rewarded ads have the highest eCPM and minimize negative experiences because users choose to watch them.
guide.screenshotFeatureDesc: You can save ads you like to your gallery from the Banner ads screen. This is useful for collecting ad references.
guide.findSaveButtonDesc: There's a blue 'Save' button at the bottom of each banner ad card.
guide.grantPermissionDesc: The first time you save, you'll be asked for gallery access permission. Select 'Allow'.
guide.saveCompleteDesc: A notification will appear when saved successfully. Check the saved image in your gallery.
guide.adFormatComparisonDesc: Compare the characteristics of each ad format to choose the right one for your situation.
guide.adsWontLoadA: Check your internet connection. Make sure Wi-Fi or mobile data is enabled. Try restarting the app.
guide.noRewardA: You must watch the rewarded ad until the end to receive the reward. If you close it mid-way, you won't receive the reward.
guide.cantSaveScreenshotA: Check if gallery/photo access permission is granted in your device settings.
